RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Graduado em Administraзгo pela Universidade Luterana do Brasil (2006). Pos-graduado em Gestгo e Estratйgia Empresarial pela ULBRA (2008). Mestre em engenharia sobre geraзгo de energia elйtrica fotovoltaica pela ULBRA (2011). Doutor em Engenharia Civil sobre energia elйtrica fotovoltaica pela UFSC (2017). Foi professor na faculdade de Administraзгo na Universidade Luterana do Brasil - ULBRA, campus de Gravataн, atй 2010. Atualmente й consultor empresarial. Tem 48 anos de experiкncia na indъstria, tendo trabalhado 18 anos como projetista de sistemas eletrфnicos de controle na Itбlia e 30 anos como diretor tйcnico de empresa de alta tecnologia em mecвnica fina e eletrфnica de controle, no Brasil. Tem experiкncia na бrea de Engenharia Elйtrica, com кnfase em circuitos eletrфnicos e digitais, sistemas de controle analуgicos e digitais, gerenciamento de projetos, sistemas de geraзгo de energia elйtrica fotovoltaica para uso espacial, analise econфmica de sistemas fotovoltaicos residenciais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Graduated in Business Administration at ULBRA (Universidade Luterana do Brasil) (2006). Has completed a postgraduation course in Strategic Management at ULBRA (2008). Has completed his Master degree in engineering related to photovoltaic generation of electrical energy at ULBRA (2011). Has obtained his doctoral degree in civil engineering related to photovoltaic generation of electrical energy for residential use at UFSC (Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina) (2017). Acted as a professor in business administration at ULBRA Gravatai until 2010. Presently he is a business consultant. He has been working for 48 years in the industry, acting as electronic systems designer for 18 years, in Italy and as the technical director of a brazilian high tech company producing fine mechanic and electronic control systems in Brazil, during 30 years. He has experience in Electric Engineering, focusing on Electronic Circuits (digital and analog), analog and digital control systems, project management and photovoltaic energy generation for space use, economical analysis of residential photovoltaic systems..

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Conhecimento de valores econфmicos e a atitude dos funcionбrios

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Anбlise da evoluзгo da energia fotovoltaica no Brasil e no mundo. Comparaзгo de custos com aqueles da geraзгo com usins a carvгo no Rio Grande do Sul. Detalhamento dos custos visнveis e invisнveis da geraзгo a carvгo, considerando os efeitos secundбrios na saъde humana. Produзгo de um modelo de anбlise econфmica e de sensibilidade dos fatores que afetam a geraзгo fotovoltaica no Brasil. Proposta de incentivos а geraзгo fotovoltaica e analise dos seus efeitos.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Analisys of the evolution of photovoltaic energy in Brazil and world wide. Comparison of generation costs to those of coal-fired power plants. Detailed evaluation of visible and invisible costs of coal power plants, inluding secondary effects on human health. A model for economical analysis and sensitivity evaluation of factors that affect photovoltaic generation in Brazil was produced. Government incentives are proposed and their effects examined.
